import React, { Component } from "react"; import * as routes from "../constants/routes"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import withAuthorization from "./withAuthorization"; import { db } from "../firebase"; class Project3 extends Component { state = { users: null, username: "", loading: true }; componentDidMount() { db.onceGetUsers().then(res => { this.setState({ users: res.val() }); }); const { loggedUser } = this.props; db.doGetAnUnser(loggedUser.uid).then(res => { this.setState({ username: res.val().username, loading: false }); }); } render() { const { users, username, loading } = this.state; // console.log("dasdf", this.props.loggedUser); return (

CODE Challenge using Ionic Framework

Volunteer365

The Buzz is Messe Frankfurt Dubai-subsidiary’s staff magazine. Its first issue launched in 2015 and considered an Online Communications team-exclusive task. Joining the department as Online Communications Executive last November 2018, I was challenged in leading its creative execution after being brought back after the plans of discontinuing it. The Buzz reflects the culture of Messe Frankfurt’s Dubai subsidiary. Within the communications design team, this also serves as our creative playground and “guinea pig” for future e-mail campaigns. There is a lack of resources for the project.

The 22nd edition gathered 1,084 exhibitors from 56 countries across 7 product sections: Commercial Security, Smart Home, The last 6-7 weeks have been unprecedented; we’ve been forced to adapt to new situations and procedures in almost a blink of an eye; we’ve had to abandon our plans and reorganise almost every part of our daily lives. We’ve never experienced anything like this before, and we hope we’ll never experience it again.

Released 30th April 2020

Download Android APK
That which is measured, improves.

The curated visuals was highly appreciated by our colleagues. This time around, we wanted to integrate our headquarter’s choice of emailing software — Mailingworks. Team: Gareth Wright (team manager), Kaye So Kua (creatives and e-mail dispatch), Saadia Shaikh (writer), Kris Ramos (layout designer)

Read The Buzz Winter Edition 2019
That Which Is Measured, Improves.

As the world’s leading fair and exhibition company, Messe Frankfurt team invests on skilled event photographers to ensure these corporate events are properly documented and well-represented. These high-quality photos are one of our marketing team’s versatile assets. It is important to generously include these photos in our staff magazine. From an experienced digital designer perspective, I also wanted to give it an overall professional boost — so I replaced the Microsoft Publisher and introduced Adobe InDesign to the team. Team: Gareth Wright (team manager), Prabin Prabakharan (content writer), Kaye So Kua (creative execution)

Read The Buzz Winter Summer 2019
